name: Unshapely
description:
Unshapely is a puzzle game about perpective. When you see the world only from one side, the things you see can be anything with the same shape. This short game features 13 unique puzzles with increasing difficulty. See if you can beat all of them!

This game is our first game that we made, so don't expect something crazy. It's a submission for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1, and we want to still work on the project after the gamejam.

Controls

Move using A and D.
Change between modes using Space.
Restart the level using R.

Credits
